name: Buddha Shakyamuni
title: Buddha" - Buddhist Mythology
subtitle: The Enlightened One, Teacher of Liberation
shortDescription: Siddhartha Gautama, who achieved perfect enlightenment under the Bodhi tree and spent 45 years teaching the path to liberation from suffering. The Buddha represents the potential for awakening present in all sentient beings.
longDescription:
